Posts.Content: thankyou cindy for your kind words i was very low and frightened when i first posted on these boards,for all my fears my ct scan came back clear other than the tumor on my breast that really was the boost i needed and snapped me out of the fear i was going to die.i still have a way to go chemo,surgery then radiation treatment but the good news is my tumor has already started to shrink and im no longer in pain.im now feeling much more positive and in a funny kind of way feel very very lucky .
Posts.Title: breast clinic have told me my biopsy results will be coming back as cancer

Posts.Content: im in shock right now especially as this has happened very fast,you hear people talk of fighting cancer but how do i do that when im feeling the dooms of despair.suddenly i feel ill and i can feel lots of different aches and pains convincing myself its spread all over. i know i sound full of self pity right now but im so scared im going to die and i cant talk about this to my loved ones and friends because i know i will upset them.i keep putting on a brave face to everyone but every moment im alone im breaking down.how the hell do i get my act together, my results come back on friday and i have been told things will move pretty fast after that buteverytime i look at my kids i feel so guilty im a single mum and they rely on me they need me.i feel terrible knowing im going to scare and worry them. the other thing is i keep trying to hang on to that 1% they have given me that the tumor will come back benign ,but deep down i know they wouldnt have given me the diagnosis unless they was certain.my heads every where one moment im thinking im dying the next im thinking they have got it wrong.are these normal reactions and how do i get over being so negitive.
Posts.Title: breast clinic have told me my biopsy results will be coming back as cancer

Posts.Content: ive just had a ct scan done to see if my breast cancer has spread and was told the oncologist will be in touch.i already have a appointment to see him in 10 days time am i likely to hear the results before or is it a case of waiting for my appointment.
Posts.Title: breast clinic have told me my biopsy results will be coming back as cancer

Posts.Content: thanks for your support the biopsy comfirmed i have breast cancer but the nymph node biopsy came back clear,my consultant wasnt there when i went for the results so i have appointment on monday for blood results and go through my options but have been given a rough idea of what to expect which will start with surgery.
Posts.Title: breast clinic have told me my biopsy results will be coming back as cancer

Posts.Content: i have recently been diagnosed with breast cancer and have just had my first chemo session 5 days ago,im really struggling with the side effects which are making me feel really ill.i have changed my sickness medication to help me be able to eat and drink but it just seems to have brought a new set of problems and i still continue to feel grotty, spaced out and sickly and im now also having bad dreams.
Posts.Title: breast clinic have told me my biopsy results will be coming back as cancer

Posts.Title: breast clinic have told me my biopsy results will be coming back as cancer

Posts.Content: hi i had a very similar diagnosis i was told that because my tumor though contained and not spread anywhere was filling most of the breast ,if they operated they risked shreading cancer cells so the safest option was to try and shrink the tumor.for what its worth i was scanned after my first chemo and my tumor just after one session halved its size and over all responded very well to chemo.sometimes i dont think they realise how we dwell on these things and they should choose their words more carefully, no wonder your doubting after being told that it might not do much i also had an oncologist who was very negitive caused me alot of extra stress and upset. ive since had my op and am now just about starting rads so im quite a way ahead of you.good luck.
Posts.Title: pre-surgery chemo?

Posts.Content: ive just had a ct scan done to see if my breast cancer has spread and was told the oncologist will be in touch.i already have a appointment to see him in 10 days time am i likely to hear the results before or is it a case of waiting for my appointment.
